sentences.english: Killing an alien gives you some points.
sentences.chinese: 殺死一個外星人會給您加分。

sentences.english: Fair-skinned Marcia Cross may just be an alien.
sentences.chinese: 皮膚白皙的馬西婭可能是外星人。

sentences.english: As a matter of fact, extraterrestrials have landed.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，外星人登陸過地球。

sentences.english: I like aliens because I think they are smart and special.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡外星人，以爲我覺得他們很聰明很特別。

sentences.english: I saw a UFO. 2. We were visited by aliens.
Peope have shown great interest in his disappearance due to alien visits.
sentences.chinese: 由於外星人來訪人們對他的失蹤表現出極大的興趣。

sentences.english: If aliens landed here right now, what would you do?
sentences.chinese: 如果此刻有外星人在此登陸，你會怎麼做？

sentences.english: My classmate was abducted by aliens.
sentences.chinese: 我的同學被外星人拐跑了。

sentences.english: On the question of 'external guidance', he does not rule out extraterrestrial help.
sentences.chinese: 至於“遙控指導”的問題，他沒有排除外星人的幫助。

sentences.english: The extraterrestrials may be too different from us to communicate with usefully.
sentences.chinese: 也許是外星人與我們太不一樣了而不能較好的溝通。

sentences.english: Mitchell's belief in the existence of aliens is well documented.
sentences.chinese: 米切爾確信外星人存在的觀點，之前也是有案可查的。

sentences.english: The alien itself was pale in color, I could even say white.
sentences.chinese: 外星人的面色很差，甚至可以說是蒼白。

sentences.english: Oxford Black series. Men in Black (MIB) keep the peace between aliens from outer space (ETs) and humans.
sentences.chinese: 星際戰警必須維護人類和外星人之間的和平。

sentences.english: He also observed when an Ewok scouting expedition crossed paths with offworlders.
sentences.chinese: 他還發現有一支伊渥克偵察隊碰到了外星人。

sentences.english: David Drumlin: Ellie, still waiting for E. T. to call.
sentences.chinese: 你還在等外星人打來電話麼？

sentences.english: Some people were convinced that crop circles were sites where alien spaceships had landed.
sentences.chinese: 有些人深信麥田圈是外星人太空船所降落的地方。

definition: Star Trek (US TV and film series)
